titleStmt.title: A perfect relation of severall remarkable passages, which passed betwixt the Kings most Excellent Majesty, and the Commissioners, the last fast-day at Holmby, about the Directory and forme of prayer. And His Maiesties resolution therein. Also, some other passages of note, concerning the Kings Majesty, and the Earl of Pembroke upon Sunday last, upon his Majesties giving this worthy peer a visite, as he lay upon his death-bed. With divers other remarkable occurrences from the kingdomes of Scotland and Ireland.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "1646"; the 7 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
